attributes.action: Stop Allerdale Borough Council doubling the car parking charges in Cockermouth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allerdale Borough Council are effectively closing Cockermouth following the floods by discouraging people visiting the businesses in the town by doubling car parking charges. They're shouting in the news about getting people to kick start the economy in the town, yet crippling it with this unbelievable decision. Please sign this petition if you want to help the people of Cockermouth
